message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm hoping to get it for closer to $75.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to get it for $75, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $90. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.
Alice, I appreciate you being willing to compromise. I'm still hoping to get it for a bit lower, though. Would you be willing to do $85? It's closer to my target price and a good deal for both of us.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go all the way down to $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $92. It's still a great compromise, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product.
Alice, I understand you're firm on your price.  I'm willing to go up to $87, but that's my final offer.  Let me know if you're willing to accept.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again. However, I'm not willing to go all the way down to $87. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $95. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product.
